title: Positive Energy Crystal Candle
description: Attract positive energy into your life with this Crystal Candle. Light the candle and enjoy the uplifting scent of jasmine and apple blossom and wait for your amethyst crystal to be revealed. Once revealed understand your crystal powers with the help of the guide book included.
